name: Logic Select

inputs.name: Condition
inputs.description: Boolean value that determines the result

inputs.name: Then
inputs.description: The value to pass if condition is true

inputs.name: Else
inputs.description: The value to pass if condition is false

outputs.name: Result
outputs.description: A value based on the inputs

description: Pass a value based on condition; (supporting Number, Boolean, Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, Color)
